name: Antidote (DanielSnd)
description:
Oh no, grabbing the precious GOLDEN IDOL has triggered a poison gas trap! You only have 10 seconds in each room to reach the antidote at the end, granting you yet another precious 10 seconds.

But hey, why not try to grab as much MOOLAH as possible on your way out?

CONTROLS
========
WASD - Move the player
LEFT MOUSE - Shoot
RIGHT MOUSE - Throw Dynamite

CREDITS
=======
Chevy Ray Johnston - Programming
Whitaker Trebella - Music & SFX
Eliza Wibisono - Art
Daniel Nascimento - Art

POSTMORTEM
=======

Art Postmortem - http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/2013/08/30/antidote...


PLAYTHROUGH
